entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -43.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -43.8°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -48.8°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: Clear. Ice fog at times late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 62 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
